column4: trying to view the "processes" tab in System Monitor closes it...what should I do?
run gnome-system-monitor from a terminal, do the same and check if there is a comprehensible error message
when I launch it with the terminal, it says "SELinux was found was but is not enabled." and when I click the processes tab it tells me there was a segmentation fault
that's not really helping. Sorry. Use top or htop in terminal; you'll need to install the latter but thatÂ´s the easiest to use.
